data.comment: The match has started.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
In the minute 2, Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, German Cano for the away team is judged to be offside.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Andrey (Vasco da Gama) has received a yellow card from Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 7, Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Guilherme Arana (Atletico Mineiro) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Goal! Vasco da Gama have got their heads in front thanks to a Martin Benitez strike.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 11, Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 13, Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Guilherme Arana.
That's a fine assist from Nathan.
In the minute 15, Free kick Vasco da Gama.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro attack through Alan Franco. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 17, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Jefferson Savarino is on target to give Atletico Mineiro a 2-1 advantage.
Keno with an assist there.
In the minute 20, Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Atletico Mineiro's Keno is whistled for offside at Independencia.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Important block from the Vasco da Gama defence as Keno fires in a strike for Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 25, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vasco da Gama's half?
In the minute 28, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Atletico Mineiro.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Nathan for Atletico Mineiro who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Guga nets and Atletico Mineiro extend their lead to 3-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
In the minute 30, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Nathan is back on the pitch.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a throw-in for Vasco da Gama, close to Atletico Mineiro's area.
In the minute 31, Vasco da Gama drive upfield and Talles Magno gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atletico Mineiro defender.
German Cano (Vasco da Gama) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 33, Eduardo Sasha (Atletico Mineiro) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Vasco da Gama defenders.
German Cano for Vasco da Gama is whistled offside.
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro's Jefferson Savarino is caught offside.
Ramon Menezes (Vasco da Gama) is making a first substitution, with Yago Pikachu replacing Carlinhos.
In the minute 36, Marcos Junior is on a sub for Vinicius for Vasco da Gama.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 37, Goal! Keno extends Atletico Mineiro's lead from the spot. They now lead 4-1.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leandro Castan (Vasco da Gama) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 39, Attention is being given to Atletico Mineiroâ€™s Eduardo Sasha and play has been suspended briefly.
Atletico Mineiro have a dangerous throw-in.
Eduardo Sasha returns to the field for Atletico Mineiro after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 41, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
Vasco da Gama push forward at Independencia and Marcos Junior gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atletico Mineiro defence.
Jair is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atletico Mineiro's Jair looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 45, Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Sasha is on target but unsuccessful.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at Independencia.
The first-half is over at Independencia.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Belo Horizonte to check on Keno, who is grimacing with pain.
Atletico Mineiroâ€™s Keno is on his feet again at Independencia.
In the minute 48, Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama drives forward and Henrique Silva gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 51, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
Atletico Mineiro are coming forward and Jair gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
In the minute 53, Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro's Keno gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 55, Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 57, Vasco da Gama needs to be cautious. Atletico Mineiro have an attacking throw-in.
Nathan of Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
In the minute 58, Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro's Guilherme Arana misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
In the minute 60, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 60, Andrey has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 64, Keno (Atletico Mineiro) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bruno Gomes is replacing Talles Magno for the away team.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
The match at Independencia has been interrupted briefly for a check on Nathan, who is down injured.
In the minute 67, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 68, Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
The home team replace Jair with Dylan Borrero.
Nathan (Atletico Mineiro) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Allan.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Independencia.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 71, Atletico Mineiro are pushing forward but Keno's finish is wide of the goal.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden blows against Atletico Mineiro's Keno for offside.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 72, Marrony is replacing Eduardo Sasha for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Dylan Borrero is booked for the home team.
In the minute 74, Allan for Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Allan (Atletico Mineiro) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Atletico Mineiro drive forward but Keno is judged offside.
In the minute 78, Atletico Mineiro's Allan breaks free at Independencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Dylan Borrero (Atletico Mineiro) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Martin Benitez (Vasco da Gama) gets booked by Leandro Pedro Vuaden, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 81, Atletico Mineiro's Rever attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
In the minute 82, Throw-in high up the field for Atletico Mineiro in Belo Horizonte.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Independencia.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 84, In Belo Horizonte, Bruno Gomes of Vasco da Gama is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 84, Ygor Catatau is replacing German Cano for the away team.
Vasco da Gama make their fourth substitution with Fellipe Bastos replacing Miranda.
Vasco da Gama are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 86, It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
Atletico Mineiro's Junior Alonso has been booked in Belo Horizonte.
Atletico Mineiro pushes forward through Guilherme Arana, whose finish on goal is saved.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the home team a throw-in.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Belo Horizonte.
Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at Independencia.
Guga has recovered and rejoins the match in Belo Horizonte.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden blows to end the match. The final score is 4-1.
Savio is on a sub for Keno for Atletico Mineiro.
The home team have replaced Junior Alonso with Igor Rabello. This is the fifth substitution made today by Jorge Sampaoli.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden waits before resuming play because Guga for Atletico Mineiro is still down.
